Text: I've seen this once, on a very cruddy VHS tape rented from a mom-and-pop shop. Stark, at times dreamily , other times sharply painful. I'd very much like to see it again, but without the image fritzing out all the time due to being an ancient tape. Might buy the thing one day, if I can find a local DVD. Anyway, it's rather unfortunate that there are no seeders, as more people really ought to see this film. I'd recommend it for freakyflicks' collection.

Please, please seed this. I would love to see this film.

Thank you.
